V.iii.6.3.d
.
Interpreting Lab Reports for HCV After 1992
The table below provides an example of a laboratory interpretation of serology testing for HCV for testing performed after 1992.
Tests
Results
Interpretation
anti-HCV
positive (probable chronic hepatitis)
need to verify diagnosis
EIA
positive
supplemental test required
RIBA
positive
diagnostic
HCVRNA
follow-up of chronic HCV
not needed for rating
